/* package codechef; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Codechef
{
    private static final Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);

    private static int[] loadData(int size) {
        int[] data = new int[size];
        while (size-->0) { data[size] = in.nextInt(); } // Note: we are loading in reverse, because order doesn't matter here.
        return data;
    }

    private static void shuffle(int[] data) {
        int[] temp = new int[data.length + (data.length&1)];
        for (int i=0,low=0,high=data.length; i<data.length;) {
            temp[i++] = data[--high];
            temp[i++] = data[low++];
        }
        System.arraycopy(temp,0,data,0,data.length);
    }

    private static void print(int[] data) {
        StringBuilder s = new StringBuilder();
        for(int i=0; i<data.length; i++) {
            s.append(" ").append(data[i]);
        }
        System.out.println(s.substring(1));
    }

    private static void run(int[] data) {
        Arrays.sort(data);
        shuffle(data);
        print(data);
    }

	public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
	    int cases = in.nextInt();
	    while (cases-->0) {
	        run(loadData(in.nextInt()));
	    }
	}
}
